prompt: Evolution of human tools - stone age to AI
enhanced_prompt: Epic visual journey through human tool evolution: ancient hands chiseling stone tools in firelight, transitioning to medieval craftsman at workbench, flowing into modern person at sleek desk typing on glowing computer, culminating in futuristic holographic AI interface materializing around them, representing tools as extensions of human capability across time | Smooth seamless transitions using match-cuts and morph effects, slow dolly-forward through each era building momentum, crane shot rising at finale to reveal the grand scope of human progress | Dramatic chiaroscuro lighting in ancient scenes transitioning to warm practical light in modern era, ending with cool cyan-blue volumetric light rays from AI hologram creating aspirational atmosphere | Desaturated earthy tones (browns, ambers) in ancient scenes gradually shifting to vibrant teal and orange in modern era with high contrast, subtle film grain throughout for timeless cinematic feel | Shot on 35mm anamorphic lens in cinematic 16:9 aspect ratio, 4K photorealistic quality with seamless VFX transitions
notes: Cinematic quality evolution story with seamless era transitions, OpenAI Super Bowl commercial style
